div.h2: Drag and drop the transitional words onto the holes in the text
div.p: Algorithm X is effective at sorting strings. {contrast:}, it is less effective for texts written in other languages besides English due to the complexities of advanced character encodings, such as UTF-8. {addition:}, algorithm X is surprisingly complicated and it has been challenging for learners to grasp. {consequence:}, algorithm X has not been widely included in basic courses.
